definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: I am in the drums loud and grand.
The military band played the national anthems of China and Spain with 21 salutes lingering in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 在雄壮的21响礼炮声中，军乐队演奏中西两国国歌。

sentences.english: He was huge, black, as majestical as a bear.
sentences.chinese: 它长的很大，是黑色的，像熊一样雄壮。

sentences.english: I'am in the drums loud and grand, the thundrous hooves across Nagra…
sentences.chinese: 我是威武雄壮的鼓，踏过草原无边的纳格兰。

sentences.english: Now we have the trappings here of epic grandeur and epic subject matter.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们知道了史诗的雄壮还有主题很重要。

sentences.english: But bureaucratism , the carapace that lends a country however child, all over the mountains and plains rises magnificently.
sentences.chinese: 但官僚主义，却借国家的壳子，漫山遍野雄壮起来。

sentences.english: The Cattle have the characteristic of sturdiness , anti-anoxia and anti-fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 牛具有雄壮性猛耐寒冷，抗缺氧，抗疲劳等生理特性。

sentences.english: I am in the drums loud and grand, the thunderous hooves across Nagrand.
sentences.chinese: 我是威武雄壮的鼓，踏过无垠草原的纳格兰。

sentences.english: Tiger leaping gorge is the world famous grand canyon, and grotesque known to the world.
sentences.chinese: 虎跳峡是世界上著名的大峡谷，以奇险雄壮著称于世。

sentences.english: The eagle tripod is only 36 cm high but has a heroic image.
sentences.chinese: 陶鹰鼎通高只有36厘米，但看上去显得威武而雄壮。

sentences.english: I see behind the establishment of a group of magnificent and beautiful and Ningwu.
sentences.chinese: 看看在我后面建立一群又美丽又雄壮的冰屋。

sentences.english: The whale in the eyes of Zhuangzi is gallant, heroic and holy.
sentences.chinese: 庄子眼中的鲸是雄壮的，势不可挡甚至神圣的。

sentences.english: A little mouse can help a big lion like me ?
sentences.chinese: 一只小小的老鼠能帮助向我这样雄壮的狮子？

sentences.english: And amid a glorious burst of music from the orchestra the curtain fell.
sentences.chinese: 乐队突然奏出一支雄壮的曲子，幕帘随之落下。

sentences.english: Sadly, but pictures can’t convey all the majesty of these rocks.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，照片无法重现岩石的雄壮。

definition: to have an imposing or impressive appearance/impressive appearance/straight and impressive looking
